work.summary: Working as a Java Developer for a marketing automation tool from Marketo - an Adobe Company.
highlights: Worked on various Java based framework like Spring Boot, Hibernate, TestNg etc.
Developed a Voice-Based Chat Assistant for the Marketo - An Adobe Company using RASA Conversation framework (NLP)  in python.

work.summary: Worked as a Poker Bot Developer for the mobile gaming application named Poker Square
highlights: Developed a Poker-Bot Algorithm using Monte Carlo Simulation.
Implemented the algorithm using Elixir Programming in the gaming application.

Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013
